dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4046 IH: Unmuzzle the Drug Czar Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cohen introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To strike provisions that prohibit the Director of the Office of National Drug Control Policy from studying the legalization of marijuana, that require the Director to oppose any attempt to legalize marijuana, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Unmuzzle the Drug Czar Act of 2014.

section.header: Removal of restriction and requirement on the Director of the Office of National Drug Control Policy relating to marijuana
section.text: Section 704(b) of the Office of National Drug Control Policy Reauthorization Act of 1998 (21 U.S.C. 1703(b)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (13) through (20) as paragraphs (12) through (19), respectively; and
in paragraph (13)(A), as so redesignated, by striking paragraph (13) and inserting paragraph (12).
